description: A simple and healthy recipe for perfectly grilled salmon fillets. This dish is quick to prepare and bursting with flavor.

steps.description: In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, dried dill, salt, and pepper.

Place the salmon fillets in a shallow dish or resealable bag. Pour the marinade over the salmon, ensuring it's evenly coated. Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 15 minutes, or up to 30 minutes. Do not marinate for longer, as the lemon juice can start to 'cook' the salmon.
Preheat your grill to medium-high heat (about 400-450째F or 200-230째C). Lightly oil the grill grates to prevent sticking.

Remove the salmon from the marinade and place it on the preheated grill. If grilling skin-on salmon, place skin-side down first. Grill for 4-6 minutes per side, or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork. Cooking time will vary depending on the thickness of the fillets.
The internal temperature of the salmon should reach 145째F (63째C). Use a meat thermometer to check.

conclusion: Serve the grilled salmon immediately. It pairs well with roasted vegetables, rice, or a fresh salad. Enjoy!
